benchmark_details.name: Counting-Stars ( ★)
benchmark_details.overview: Counting-Stars is a multi-evidence, position-aware, and scalable benchmark designed to evaluate the multi-evidence retrieval capabilities of long-context LLMs.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the long context capabilities of multi-evidence searching and reasoning of LLMs.

data.source: Generated data representing contexts and evidence related to counting stars.
data.annotation: Data is generated with varying conditions for evaluation.

methodology.calculation: Scores are computed based on the correctness of the retrieved numbers in multi-evidence tasks.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in retrieving and reasoning over multi-evidence.
